overview: Juna is assigned to write a horror novel about ghosts. To get a true story, Juna must open her inner eye. The inner eye brought him to meet a beautiful orange-haired ghost named Miemien. Love also exists between Juna and Miemien. The unique romance between Juna, Caca, Devin and Miemien also appears.
title: Miemien Hantu Posesif
